ValidationRule.description: Fires to confirm that the "Rating % Benefits info with confirmation?" field is filled out before the Opportunity can go to Closed/Won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( TEXT( Rate_Benefit_info_with_confirmation__c )) && TEXT ( StageName ) = "Closed Won" && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Assumptive_Renewal'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Field is required to move to Closed/Won.
